name: description
description: Contains a summary of key project points automatically generated.
title: Description

name: schedule
description: A schedule of one single day that lists activities and their specific timings.
title: Schedule

content.note: This element is mandatory and must be retained at the end.

name: checklist
description: A checklist or binary task list used to track completion status (done/pending) of items.
title: Checklist

name: stepslist
description: A steps list that defines a sequential, ordered set of steps required to complete a process.
title: Steps

name: teamlist
description: A team list detailing team members and their assigned roles or responsibilities.
title: Team & Roles

name: supplieslist
description: A supplies list or inventory that details required materials or items.
title: Supplies List

name: searchnext
description: A list of search terms or relevant topics/keywords for further research or investigation.
title: Search Next

name: timeline
description: A timeline or chronological overview highlighting key milestones, events, or phases of a project.
title: Timeline
